'''Hachihou''' {{Lang|ja=八宝}} is a [[Northland Cat]] and [[NPC]] located at the [[Asase Shrine]], [[Seirai Island]], [[Inazuma]].

==Profile==
[[Neko]] describes Hachihou as a very agile little fellow, who very fond of fish. For this reason, it will sometimes go to the seaside to look for fish that have washed up on the shore.<ref>{{Ref/Quest|Neko Is a Cat: The Children}}</ref>

==Quests and Events==
{{Quests and Events}}

==Trivia==
* Hachihou is named after the concept of the {{Lang|{{w|Eight Treasures}}|zh=八宝|zh_rm=Bābǎo|ja=八宝|ja_rm=Happou|ko=팔보(八寶)|ko_rm=Palbo|sort=zh,ja,ko}} or {{W|Ashtamangala}}, a suite of eight auspicious symbols associated with enlightenment; originating from Buddhism and other Dharmic religions.
